forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the morning. A few rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming partly cloudy late. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain or snow showers in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
